programmes.show_description: The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!
Dust off your flip phones and get ready to dance the day away with the ultimate collection of hits that'll transport you back to those unforgettable millenium parties!
Dust off your flip phones and get ready to dance the day away with the ultimate collection of hits that'll transport you back to those unforgettable millenium parties!
Celebrate 40 Great British musical icons! Enjoy the best in pop, rock, dance and more. Each artist or group a genuine Brit music legend.
The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!
BRIT winner for Outstanding Contribution Mark Ronson has been making bangers since 2003! Here's some of his greatest work featuring Dua Lipa, Amy Winehouse, Lily Allen & RAYE!
Every track a smash hit in the 90s or 00s, every video a UK chart number one. What more do you need for your weekend?
Two decades of BRIT icons with every Best British Single winner from 1990 to 2009! From Britpop battles to pop explosions these are the anthems you can sing every word of!
The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!
Red, White & Blue - and that's just Pat! This is a 2 hour Sharp Selection of homegrown hitmakers of the 90s - from Take That & Texas to Cathy Dennis & Wet Wet Wet.
Your unofficial BRITs warm up party with sing-out-loud anthems & the biggest party hits from British and International superstars.
BRIT winner for Outstanding Contribution Mark Ronson has been making bangers since 2003! Here's some of his greatest work featuring Dua Lipa, Amy Winehouse, Lily Allen & RAYE!
Your unofficial BRITs warm up party with sing-out-loud anthems & the biggest party hits from British and International superstars.
Ain't no party like a BRITs warm-up party! We've got it sorted with 40 of the UK's WannaBe's, Angels & greatest singalong anthems to get you in the mood!
The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!
275 songs reached number 1 across the 00s - a record - so there are bound to be a few you've long forgotten! Pat Sharp digs out 30, including David Sneddon, Meck and Orson.
The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!
BRIT winner for Outstanding Contribution Mark Ronson has been making bangers since 2003! Here's some of his greatest work featuring Dua Lipa, Amy Winehouse, Lily Allen & RAYE!
The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!
The awards are over but the party continues here! We've got it sorted with 40 of the UK's WannaBe's, Angels & greatest singalong anthems!
Kick the kids out, lock the door as its time for some good old fashioned Sunday morning lovin'.
The ultimate countdown of 00s love songs. All with heartfelt vocals, lush strings & big breakdowns in a four-hour marathon! Expect Taylor Swift, Beyonce & of course James Blunt!
Kick the kids out, lock the door as its time for some good old fashioned Sunday morning lovin'.
Journey through the biggest hits of the one and only Britney Spears. From her infectious pop tunes to her iconic dance moves, get ready to sing along with the ultimate pop princess

programmes.show_name: Who Had The Most Hits In The 00s?!
programmes.show_description: They all racked up loads of Top Ten entries, but which acts had more than 20 during that decade? And who had 17 in just one calendar year?! Let's count 'em down and find out!
The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!
A mammoth singalong session of 90s anthems guaranteed to put you in the mood. From Spice Girls & Sheryl Crow to Bon Jovi & Right Said Fred - a full-on decade of top tunes!
Kick back and relax with some mellow moments. Chilled to perfection.
